body:
Please use Markdown syntax to style your documentation for readability. Refer here:
- https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/

In order to preview your documentation, you can use an extension package for your code editor.
- If you use *Sublime Text Editor*, you can install and use [Markdown Preview package](https://packagecontrol.io/packages/Markdown%20Preview)

or you can copy markdown documentation into [StackEdit.io](https://stackedit.io/) to preview the documentation there 


### Reference ###
- See [this Udacity course on Writing Readmes](https://www.udacity.com/course/writing-readmes--ud777)
- See [this Markdown guide](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/) to help you style your documentation
